attributes.name: connected-to-id
attributes.description: ID of the HTML input that the autocomplete panel should be attached to. In case you can't provide an ID you can use the method `setInputRef` documented in the methods section of these docs.

attributes.name: highlight-first-option
attributes.description: Whether the first option in the panel should be highlighted when it is opened.

attributes.name: select-highlighted-option
attributes.description: Whether an options value should be transfered to the input when highlighted. When pressing ESC the value won't be saved and the input resets to the original value.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: **Optional** string that is used to display the option in contexts that only allow strings (e.g. inputs). If not provided the `innerHtml` is used.

properties.name: value
properties.description: **Optional** data that is attached to an option.
